name: Unibat
description:
Real-time strategy Unibat is a game where you build your own kingdom and manage
them, train knights and fight against enemy camps of orcs.
The game is set in a dark fantasy world where you take on the role of a king,
who must expand his territory and protect the kingdom from the invading orc forces.

As the game progresses, you will have to make strategic decisions about how to allocate resources,
build your army and in which battles to participate. Your ultimate goal is to defeat the orc camps and
establish dominion over the earth.

Peculiarities:
- Dark atmosphere.
- Enemies progress with you.
- Addictive gameplay.
